The service fee goes toward helping us pay couriers, provide quality customer support & logistics, process payments, and other costs associated with running our service. Service fee We require the last 4 digits of your Social Security Number to verify your payment account. We don\'t hold this information, it\'s transferred automatically to Stripe (our payment system) The flag will be shown next to your profile picture in the platform. That should be a representative of your cooking, culture, cuisine, and personality :) Social security number State your profile flag Cancel order

//CookingSlotNewFlow Go to review My cooking slot menu Save cooking slot Review your cooking slot Select dishes & add quantities More options Opening time Closing time Set time Change Adding a last call for orders may impact your sales, as 50% of our order are placed on-demand.\n\nAfter this time, your cooking slot will no longer be visible to customers. Please enter operating hours An Error Occurred Please Try Again Later By category Nothing came up. Please try searching\nfor something else. Quantity %s - %s Add additional dishes Edit Duplicate Delete Edit cooking slot Create cooking slot Edit cooking slot menu Update cooking slot Menu cannot be empty Dish quantity cannot be 0 After the time selected, you\'ll no longer be able to collect new orders or be visible to customers.\n\nAdding the last call for orders may impact your sales, as 70% of our orders are on-demand.\n\nLast Call is optional and we recommend only using this feature sparingly.\n\nThe last call time you select will apply to the initial cooking slot and future recurring cooking slots, not just to a specific dish. Last call for order Add an optional last call "%s before your cooking slot ends" Last call is only recommended for baked goods or large meals, most chefs won’t need to use this Warning We don’t recommend setting a last call for your cooking slot. After your last call, customers won’t be able to order from you. Do you wish to continue? Continue Update cooking slot For which cooking slots would you like to save the changes you made? Delete cooking slot Which cooking slots would you like to delete? Are you sure you want to delete this cooking slot? This and following This slot Order food packaging WoodSpoon provides packaging for all your entrees and sides. This complimentary service is included in your 15% service fee. You’ll only cover the shipping cost. We work with SmartSource, a third party, to fulfill each packaging order and make the process seamless for you.\n\nTo order packaging, proceed with the following steps:\n\n1. Proceed to SmartSource’s website and locate the Products Page. Add any packaging you need to the cart (Don’t go overboard! WoodSpoon monitors every order) \n\n2. Login or Sign Up for a new account if it’s your first time.\n\n3. Checkout and enter your billing information. Your packaging will arrive in 5–7 business days. Important Make sure you enter your correct shipping and billing address.
